s.text: By way of reassuring that his outfit has really changed, Tailhook's president tells the Times , "We've had color coordination seminars for the wives.
The thin line being tightroped by the U.N. explains the paper, is to assert its sole administrative authority without turning the KLA into an opponent.

At one point, he says, the firm tried to branch out from guns into motorcycle helmets, but was soon hit with a $100,000 legal judgment paid to the family of a young man who died in an accident while wearing a Taurus model.
